subject: Books and Literature
Automobile Racing
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Mr. Ruesch was a successful Swiss racecar driver in the years before World War II who later became a writer of well-received novels of adventure, two of which became Hollywood films.
snippet: Mr. Ruesch was a successful Swiss racecar driver in the years before World War II who later became a writer of well-received novels of adventure, two of which became Hollywood films.
